meanings.definition: The outer covering of an ear of corn.
meanings.sent1: I used the cornhusks to wrap the tamales.
meanings.sent2: The farmer peeled back the cornhusks to reveal the golden kernels.
meanings.sent3: The cornhusks danced in the wind like delicate ribbons.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter rustled through the room like cornhusks in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The rustling sound of the cornhusks was soothing and calming.

meanings.definition: The dried leaves of a corn plant used for various purposes.
meanings.sent1: Grandma weaved the cornhusks into beautiful baskets.
meanings.sent2: The children made crafts using the dried cornhusks.
meanings.sent3: The cornhusks crinkled under my feet as I walked through the field.
meanings.sent4: His voice was as dry and crackly as cornhusks in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the cornhusks brought back memories of harvest time.
